Posts.Content: Anyone suffering and if so what used to cure it thank
Posts.Title: Conjunctivus

Posts.Content: Hello everyone , my name is Carol and newly diagnosed (sounds like an AA meeting) I am due surgery this Thursday  lumpectomy  and SNB . Not really been told time scales except that results 2/3 weeks. Does this mean that oncologist has seen them , do you see oncologist when getting your results, and if so does he give CT dates. Btw I have triple+ . I have a cruise booked for week on 16th Feb.  Does it hurt to delay chemo if date given before this.  I haven't cxlld it yet. So many????? And no answers just pre-empting. Also have worked out some abbreviations but not all. X
Posts.Title: Time scales

Posts.Content: Day 7 of first chemo and mouth ,Throat,nose and eyes so sore. Temp was high so called help line. Told yo come to hospital on Saturday morning and still here. On admission neutrophils were 1.2 . Next day had dropped to 0.4. So additional stay. Today they are 0.3 and this after having an injection. Feeling so much better and doc earlier was hopeful I could go home. Waiting now to see if they will let me go.
Posts.Title: First time side effects

Posts.Content: Hi saw onco last week 1st time. And RT was offered. Showed me the predictor result and said 1% benefit after 5 yrs and 3% after 10yrs if have chemo. Also said that next mammogram would be 18 months after surgery ( June 2019) my concern is that as her2+ and all info on this says aggressive don't want to be in same position if recurs. They have left decision to me if I have chemo which will 4 x ec. And 18 x herceptin. RT and hormone treatment  Has anyone with her2+ not had chemo and regretted  it .
Posts.Title: Confused??

Posts.Content: Hello everyone Got my surgery results today margin and sentinel node clear . My lump was 13mm and triple positive and my onco appt on 28th Feb. At my original appt before surgery was told that because tested her2 pos that would need chemo/herceptin. The surgeon today said that because lump was small and everything clear that chemo might not now be needed and that onco will discuss next step. Has this ever happened to anyone else. Used that predictor and only 3% difference on 5 year prognosis.
Posts.Title: Confused??

Posts.Content: Hi the nurse said pretty much the same that more than likely will get on subsequent cycles.
Posts.Title: First time side effects

Posts.Content: Hi I had my dressing change today by nurse at gp  She used th e dressing that hospital gave me but since doing,  my armpit wound is really hurting. Have had no pain in th e week since my op not sure what to do as docs are closed as it th e breast clinic. Do you think I should go to a walk in centre.
Posts.Title: Dressing change

Posts.Content: I have strips over the wounds but after the op had dressings  and watertight covering. At discharge the ward said to go to practise nurse to change dressing. My biopsy came back triple positive and I will be herceptin when my chemo starts. Just read your profile did this give you heart probs ? Carol
Posts.Title: Dressing change

Posts.Content: Thanks will leave it till th e morning. They dressing that hospital gave doesn't seem as big as th e op dressing and think that dressing not covering all of th e wound. Perhaps it's all in my head however th e pain is real . The Nurse said did I want to leave th e dressing off to lwt the air get to it. I declined that option suppose they not really trained in breast ops.
Posts.Title: Dressing change

Posts.Content: Just a quick note do not use uwigs for any on line wigs . I ordered a short funky grey wig which looked like a dead cat. I had my proper wig from trendco.  NHS West mids paid for full cost minus 8.00 . Not sure about other trusts.
Posts.Title: *** May 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Realtin I had pic line fitted today and must confess had bit tears when complications advised but I suppose they have to advise and sign consent form.   The local stings a bit like at the dentist but other than that no other effects. All in and had my 2nd round through it today.
Posts.Title: *** April 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Hi I am due #R2 tomorrow. Spent 10 days in hospital because of low white cells. Really don't want that this time around. I also have had my hair clippered. Day 14 saw hair shedding at alarming rate.  Couldnt stand it any more . Even my lady hair has gone. Saw my onco yesterday who says having the injection to boost my WBC so hopefully preventing a hospital visit. Fully aware of the pain that it can cause. So must make sure that I have enough codeine to cope with it.
Posts.Title: *** April 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Hi my 4th chemo due 18th may and 1st herceptin 8th June. Have you had any se from injections and what sort if any. Hoping that I can go away in October providing no se .
Posts.Title: *** April 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***
